overview: This coming-of-age teen dark comedy, revolves around main protagonist, Kiara, who is peer pressured into taking drugs from friends and starts to hallucinate. In this somewhat illusive, fantasy world; Kiara and her friends are on a mission to get revenge on her ex-boyfriend whilst under the influence which makes her question the situation at hand.
tagline: Things Are Never Over When You're A Nitty
title: Nitties from South
